title: ‘Mood’ Is a Genre-Bending Show About Social Media and Sex Work
description: “Mood,” a BBC America series created by Nicôle Lecky, blends music, comedy and gritty realism to explore the opportunities and risks for young women online.
dc:creator: Desiree Ibekwe
media:credit: Ellie Smith for The New York Times
media:description: In her show “Mood,” Nicôle Lecky explores the gray area between empowerment and exploitation.
